classes.title: DaVinci Cowl - Session 1 - 1st class of 2
dates: Free - yarns to be purchased in store

Sound Intriguing?  Come and figure out your secret code and then see the colours pool magically before your eyes.  Easy to do,  just 2 classes . Materials needed - 4mm x 32in circular needle & 1 skein Sweet Georgia Tough Love Sock yarn
